title: Lets get serious here
body:
http://41.media.tumblr.com/b10b3af352e4a5e132470e6ada840b22/tumblr_o3jcd74dhR1v9kw7so1_1280.png

The left took identity politics and grievance culture so far that fat people became the "Healthy at Every Size" movement. Where the overweight and obese were victimized and oppressed when society suggested their lifestyle was unhealthy and when we all preferred looking at thin people on magazine covers to obese!

How could the left possibly win this election?
